          <title>
            <string language="en">Naming, reading and writting numbers from
							0-100</string>
            <string language="ro">Numirea, citirea, scrierea numerelor 0-100</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Remenber knowledge about natural numbers: naming,
							reading, writing; Practicing the composition and decomposition of
							numbers, ordering, rows of numbers;</string>
            <string language="ro">Reactualizarea cunostintelor despre numerele naturale:
							formare, citire, scriere; Exersarea compunerii si descompunerii
							numerelor, ordonare, exemple de continuare a sirului de numere
